Modules

class myutils.peptides.info(pdb_file, withx=0)[source]
build_proline_state(aminoacid, state)[source]
Parameters:

  • aminoacid (int) – number of the aminoacid to modify. It has to correspond with a proline aminoacid.

  • state (str) – ‘endo’ or ‘exo’. States of the proline

endo_exo_proline(sith)[source]

Endo, exo states must correspond with the first angle equal to zero.

xis_angles(sith)[source]

Endo, exo states must correspond with the first angle equal to zero.
